name: Importing Takes Forever
title: Longest Import Lead Time
description: In 2016, Mauritania had the longest lead time to import goods, taking an average of 32 days. This indicates significant delays in the import process.

name: Financial Services? Not Here
title: Lowest Financial Service Imports
description: In 2023, Mauritania had the lowest percentage of insurance and financial services as part of its service imports, at just 0.037%. This suggests a limited role of financial services in the country's import economy.

name: R&D? What's That?
title: Minimal Investment in Research and Development
description: In 2018, Mauritania spent only 0.01% of its GDP on research and development, indicating a minimal focus on innovation and technological advancement.
